name: Feelin' Cheeky Clean Amplifying Talc-Free Blush Duo
about: What it is:A duo of amped up, talc-free blushes in silky satin and vibrant radiant finishes that can be worn alone or layered to give your cheeks a fresh burst of color and instant plumping effect..Highlighted Ingredients:- Sodium Hyaluronate: Hydrates and visibly plumps to diminish the visual effects of dullness..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Amp up your cheek game with this blush duo. Each duo includes a sheer satin shade to add luminosity and dimension, as well as a natural, radiant shade to pump up the vibrancy. It takes the guesswork out of blush layering, allowing you to easily customize your glow and control your color intensity.
ingredients: -Sodium Hyaluronate: Hydrates and visibly plumps to diminish the visual effects of dullness. ..Luminous Shimmer:.Mica, Kaolin, Magnesium Myristate, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Boron Nitride, Silica, Squalane, Lauroyl Lysine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Tin Oxide, Alumina, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Linalool, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake)...Natural Matte:.Mica, Kaolin, Lauroyl Lysine, Magnesium Myristate, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Boron Nitride, Squalane, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Linalool, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using a fluffy brush, apply the vibrant-radiant shade to apples of cheeks, blending out toward your hairline for a lifted effect..-Sweep the satin shade over cheekbones to add luminosity and dimension, or use alone as a sheer highlighter to create a dewy glow...Recycling Instructions:.-All GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI outer cartons are 100 percent recyclable..-Primary containers are made with sustainable materials, including 30 percent or higher PCR (post-consumer recycled) plastic or glass.

reviews.review_title: Fantastic color and payoff, doesn't fade quickly!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It took me forever to settle on a color. I knew the pigment would be there and love most the colors, but I have a hard time with shades not looking right on me, or not showing up enough. I finally bought Honeymoon Phase in-store yesterday, and I will definitely buy again, as well as another shade, and hope they come out with more!  My skin is fair with surface redness, but I guess neutral-olive, and eye shadows and blushes typically look off color or pull orange on me, with red/pink/brown, and warmth especially. I look best in shades that aren't too bright, red or coral, so I decided on a purple hue, but I was afraid this HP color would be too much of a bright purple, instead of plummy I think I need. But, it is amazing - very pigmented, shows up easily without much effort or product, didn't turn orange on me, and is a beautiful, unique color. It doesn't look chalky or heavy on my dry skin. Just a light swipe of the darker color using a standard powder brush, not dense, and it shows up so well as kind of a pinky purple in bright light, and sort of medium plummy grape when in the shade, on me at least. That will obvi depend on your skin undertones to some degree. If I want brighter/less deep, I just layer the lighter color over the darker. Otherwise, I put the lighter color just above the darker, like a highlighter. Yesterday and today, it's the same color as when applied a few+ hours prior and hasn't faded, so I imagine it will last most the day.  I don't love the scent, however. It's sort of a baby powder, more powdery scent than GXVE lip products imo. But, it's not offensive per se, even with a sensitive nose, and I don't smell it after I've closed the compact. Regardless, the product is so lovable it doesn't deter me from using or buying again. Might be missing out if you don't give it a try at least to see if it works for you, especially at decent prices :)

reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try these products because I have recently found myself in love with blush. From the gold design on the compact to the beautiful colors; I am in love with these duos.  Honestly, when I looked at the shades I was a little afraid that I wasnu2019t going to like them. As a person with a deeper skin tone I normally find myself upset at brands because they either donu2019t cater to deeper skin tones or if they do the product is normally too light or ashy on the skin. I tried out the shades u201cEx-Girlfriendu201d which is pink and u201cLasting Loveu201d which is more of a coral color. Since I did a pink eyeshadow the matte shade from Ex-Girlfriend went perfectly with the look and I was happy that this shade was pigmented and didnu2019t come off as ashy. Iu2019m not a huge fan of shimmery blush but I will just repurpose it as a eyeshadow or an inner corner highlight. Lasting Love is very pretty as well but I just donu2019t see me reaching for it since I am not a big coral blush type of person, however; if this was more on the deeper orange side then I can definitely see me wearing it daily. This is not a huge problem for me because I can just use this blush as a eyeshadow.  I love that these are buildable so if you are the type of person who likes a dramatic blush then this is perfect for you because you can easily add more if need be but if you prefer a light blush then this is great for you as well.

reviews.review_text: The GXVE Feelinu2019 Cheeky Clean Amplifying Blush Duo has changed how I add color and shine to my cheeks. What I like is how they pair two shades in each duo: a Sheer Satin for a glowy look and a Natural Radiant for a burst of vibrant color. This duo makes it easy to layer blush and lets me get creative with how bright and shiny I want my cheeks to be.I really like the Sheer Satin shade because it can also be used as a subtle highlighter, giving my face a nice, dewy shine. This blush duo makes it simple to match colors and highlighter, giving me a lovely, radiant finish that goes well with my makeup. I care about clean beauty, so I'm glad this product is vegan, cruelty-free, and made with good ingredients. It's nice to know I can get a beautiful glow while being careful about what I put on my skin.I love how just a little blush can change how I look and feel, and the GXVE Feelinu2019 Cheeky Blush Duo makes it even better by having the perfect mix of colors for my skin. It's a key part of my makeup routine, so I always have it with me. This blush duo is a big deal for anyone who wants to make their cheeks look great easily and confidently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on the GXVE Feelinu2019 Cheeky Clean Amplifying Talc-Free Blush Duo in the shades u201cEx-Girlfriendu201d and u201cLasting Love,u201d and let me tell you, theyu2019ve quickly become my go-to blushes. First off, I love that theyu2019re talc-free and packed with good-for-your-skin ingredients like Sodium Hyaluronate, which helps hydrate and plump up my cheeks for a fresh, radiant look.  Now, onto the colors u2013 u201cEx-Girlfriendu201d is this gorgeous bright pink shade that adds a pop of color to my cheeks, while u201cLasting Loveu201d is a stunning coral pink that gives me that perfect sun-kissed glow. What I love about this duo is that you can wear each shade alone for a more subtle look, or layer them together for some serious intensity. Itu2019s like having two blushes in one!  The formula is so silky and smooth, it blends effortlessly onto my skin without any patchiness or streakiness. Plus, the satin and radiant finishes give my cheeks this beautiful luminosity that lasts all day long.  And can we talk about the packaging? Not only is it cute and compact, but itu2019s also recyclable, which is a huge plus in my book. I love knowing that Iu2019m not only looking good but also doing good for the environment.  Overall, Iu2019m obsessed with the GXVE Feelinu2019 Cheeky Clean Amplifying Blush Duo. Itu2019s become a staple in my makeup routine, and I canu2019t recommend it enough. If youu2019re looking for a talc-free blush that delivers on color, glow, and performance, look no further. Trust me, you wonu2019t be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Beauty Enthusiast and lover of makeup. I love using high quality makeup products on my skin.   I have been using Gxve- Amplifying Blush Duo in the shades Lasting Love and Ex-Girlfriend. The colors of u201cEx-Girlfriendu201d are a very rich bright pink and a light pink. And the colors of Lasting Love are a very rich peach shade and a light peach shade. I am pleasantly surprised by how much I like both these blushes.   Firstly, I love that these blushes are extremely pigmented in color which means a little goes a long way and you don't need a whole lot of product to achieve the look you are going for whether subtle or bold. These blushes duo comes in two shades- matte and shimmery. In my opinion both the shades can used separately or combined together.   Secondly, I love how light weight these blushes are. They have such a nice airy, smooth texture that my cheeks don't feel clogged up or heavy when I use these. These blush are also very long lasting. I only apply it once a day and it stays on the entire day. There's is no need for re applications throughout the day.   Thirdly, I love the packaging of these blushes. The packaging definitely screams luxury and a high end product. The mirror in the packaging comes in handy for viewing exactly where/how you are applying the blush. I also love the powdery sweet smell of the blush.   Over all these blushes are amazing with beautiful colors. And I highly recommend these blushes to those looking for a pigmented and vibrant color in blush. These colors will definitely look enhance any look.   *This review was collected as part of a promotion.*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast with a love for blush, I was excited to try these blush duo in the shades Ex-Girlfriend and Lasting Love. I have light skin, always pigmented blushes are a bit too much for me, I love the blushes are buildable and offer a natural flush of color. Ex-Girlfriend shade looks bold but it matches my skin tone and I can create a beautiful look. It is perfect balance between boldness and I love wear it in day or night out, I used my hand to build my blush, it was more effective than brush, The Lasting Love shade is a bit warmer than Ex-Girlfriend. This shade is also buildable like Ex-Girlfriend, but I prefer Ex-Girlfriend on my light skin tone. The formula is blendable, easy customization, and a natural finish. These two duo shades are a bit too similar, I would love to have a light with a darker shade. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Customizable blush for pros and beginners
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am currently living in my blush era and I was immediately attracted to the GXVE Feelinu2019 Cheeky Blush Duo. Gwen spared no expense and really went all in on the gorgeous packaging. The compact has a nice weight to it with a pretty gold paisley design on the outside and a mirror on the inside which is always appreciated!  What really sets this blush apart is the fact that it can be both layered and customized. It contains a sheer shimmery shade that can be worn on its own for a subtle glowy wash of color as well as a bold satin color in a coordinating shade that is for the more bold of heart. I personally love starting with the satin side and adding the glowy blush as a topper. The longevity on these blushes is very impressive. I have oily skin and it lasted all day on me.  This blush is the ultimate crowd pleaser whether you enjoy satin or glowy or subtle or bold blush. You really canu2019t go wrong!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast and someone who loves doing make up, I was very excited to try products from the Gwen Stefani line. More importantly, I wanted to see what it would look like on black skin as not all brands are dark skin friendly. I was very thrilled by the packaging as it was made with recyclable material. The compact containers were also beautifully made and I was absolutely in love with it. I got the u201cex-girlfriendu201d which is bright pink and u201clasting loveu201d which is coral pink. The blush was not as pigmented as I would have liked it to be on my darker skin tone and it took multiple applications (as you can see in the video) for it to show. Definitely not u201ca little goes a long wayu201d. The good thing is that it is buildable. For a natural, subtle look, this blush will be good for you. If you are a darker toned person who wants something pigmented, this may not be the ideal blush for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a blush enthusiast, I'm always excited to try new formulas and shades. The GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Feelin' Cheeky Clean Amplifying Talc-Free Blush Duo has quickly become one of my go-to products for achieving a fresh, vibrant look. This duo features two complementary blush shades in silky satin and vibrant radiant finishes. The sheer satin shade adds a beautiful luminosity and dimension to my cheeks, while the natural, radiant shade provides a pop of color that instantly brightens my complexion. I love how I can wear these shades alone or layer them together to create a customized, plumped-up glow. The talc-free formula feels lightweight and comfortable on my skin, blending seamlessly for a natural-looking finish. The inclusion of sodium hyaluronate helps hydrate and visibly plump my skin, diminishing the appearance of dullness and leaving my cheeks looking healthy and radiant. As someone who values clean beauty, I appreciate that this blush duo is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free. The recyclable packaging is a nice touch, demonstrating the brand's commitment to sustainability. One of the standout features of this blush duo is its versatility. Whether I'm going for a subtle, natural look or a more intense, vibrant flush, this duo makes it easy to achieve my desired effect. The compact size and mirror also make it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. If you're looking for a high-quality, clean blush duo that offers customizable color and a plumping effect, the GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Feelin' Cheeky Clean Amplifying Talc-Free Blush Duo is definitely worth trying. With its beautiful shades and easy-to-use format, this duo has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine.     *This review was collected as a part of a promotion*

reviews.review_text: Hello, I am Chelsea. I enjoy all things beauty and love discovering products that go well with my skin tone and do not cause skin irritation. The color can be used to help highlight your cheekbone area. The color draws more dimension into your makeup. The colors are fun and blend well with my skin tone. Although I have oily skin sometimes, I did not notice any acne breakouts or irritation with my skin.   The packaging is great. I love the gold case and the mirror included inside. Upon receiving my package and unwrapping it, I was immediately captivated by its stunning packaging that adds a touch of elegance to my makeup collection. With its sleek design and attention to detail, it's a joy to display on my vanity or carry in my makeup bag. Also, the delightful aroma, reminiscent of sweet candy, added an extra layer of excitement to the my unboxing experience. This talc-free, vegan and cruelty free blush embodies the essence of clean beauty, ethical values and offers a multitude of benefits. First being its versatility, I apply it alone for a natural look or layered for intensified color and dimension. Blending is another key feature. Its velvety texture effortlessly merges with my skin, ensuring flawless blending. I'm also impressed by the long-lasting wear of this blush. It stays put throughout the day. I would highly recommend this blush to anyone in search of a product that offers vibrant colors, versatility, blendability, ethical credentials, a delightful scent, buildable coverage, and beautiful packaging. It truly checks all the boxes and is sure to become a favorite in your makeup collection.

reviews.review_text: I am always excited about a new purple blush!! I probably own, conservative estimate based on brands I might not have, 75 Percent of the Powder or Cream To Powder blushes on the market. That is why I was thrilled to try a new one. But I cannot comment on the Opacity, Staying Power, Texture, Blending, or Overall Quality of this blush because it never occurred to me to check and see if this product was heavily perfumed! Itu2019s blush. Why would it be perfumed? If I want my face to smell good, I wash it and use fresh products. If I want to smell more scented than I already do from my clean clothes, deodorant, hair conditioner, and sometimes, the Vanillin in my lipstick, then I wear perfume.  Iu2019m disappointed that this blush is heavily perfumed, or perfumed at all, because that means I canu2019t even apply it to my face or I will have a vicious allergic reaction. And honestly, I donu2019t know why cosmetics brands scent their primers, foundations, blushes, eyeshadows, setting sprays, etc. By the time you have your makeup on, youu2019re wearing 9 different perfumes, especially if your face wash and moisturizer and SPF are also scented. Itu2019s insane! So I give this product 1 star. I would give it no stars if I could, for completely excluding consumers like myself who have Sensitive Skin or are allergic to perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI As a makeup enthusiast, I am always on the lookout for products that can truly enhance my daily makeup routine. One such product that has become an absolute favorite of mine is this blush. I have been using it every single day and cannot recommend it enough to fellow makeup lovers. Firstly, the blush's color range is absolutely fantastic. No matter what your skin tone or desired look may be, this product has a shade that will complement you perfectly. Whether you prefer a subtle, natural flush or a vibrant pop of color, there is something for everyone. The pigmentation is also outstanding, ensuring that even the smallest amount goes a long way. What truly sets this blush apart is its impeccable formula. It glides onto the skin seamlessly, imparting a beautiful, radiant finish. The texture is velvety smooth, allowing for easy application and blending. It never feels cakey or powdery and stays put for hours on end, even through a busy day. The product is also buildable, making it suitable for both a soft, everyday look and a more intense evening makeup. One of the things I appreciate most about this blush is its long-lasting power. It remains vibrant and fresh throughout the day, without ever fading or becoming patchy. I no longer worry about touch-ups as it effortlessly withstands heat and humidity. The product's durability is truly remarkable, making it an ideal choice for any occasion. Moreover, the packaging is sleek and compact, making it convenient for travel or on-the-go touch-ups. The mirror included inside is an added bonus, allowing for quick and easy application wherever you may be. The compact size also means that it won't take up too much space in your makeup bag or vanity, making it a practical addition to any collection. I would highly recommend this product! (Note: This review is based on my personal experience with the product. Results may vary.)

reviews.review_text: i was gifted by GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI let me tell youuuuu!!! I am obsessed ud83dude0d i love how pigmented the blush is. It not only glows but really highlights my face features and I love how it is two in one ud83dude0d BUY! you won't regret.

And let me tell you, it makes some fierce eyeshadow. As a blush, I use the shimmery of the two where I normally would a highlighter, and the darker shade I use where Iu2019d normally apply my blush. For the eyes, the shimmery one goes on the lid, and the darker one contours before you complete it with a nice and sharp cat-eye. Seriouslyu2026 fierce af. And it wears well both ways! So its essentially a blush palette and an eyeshadow palette in one! Gifted by GXVE Beauty in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very pretty blush duo which are Sheer Satin shade to add luminosity and dimension to your cheeks. It gives a Natural Radiant shade to pump up the skin and makes it look more radiant  and bright. It is very weightless, silky pigments, glides on effortlessly and blends like a dream, giving you a long lasting fresh and flawless finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These new blushes were featured on a special display in store and looked so pretty I had to try each combo on my hand with a tissue so I could see how it looked on skin and to see the true undertones on the white tissue. These are GORGEOUS, and please know the online pics do not accurately represent their true tones. These are bright, not muted or earthy. The color saturation is like a Pantone swatch and the texture is fine, smooth,and soft. IMO these are the star product of Gwen's unique, fun, and price-friendly line. Don't be fooled by how affordable they are, these are top quality and the only hard part is choosing which combo or combos to buy! They blend easily and can be a sheer wash like the popular Dior or intensified for a more dramatic look, yet your skin will still show through because of the quality. No chalkiness here!  I believe every beautiful skin tone from mahogany to milk will be enhanced perfectly by  at least one of these color combos. The fact you get two tones in one compact make this even more fun! Honestly, I think this is the top blush intro of the season in a season that is ALL about the blush. Once I decide which combo I can't live without, I will return to Sephora to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE BEAUTY has truly outdone themselves with their blush palette. The pigmentation and vibrancy of the shades are nothing short of impressive. Each hue packs a punch of color, providing a bold and radiant flush to the cheeks. The pigmentation is buildable, allowing for a subtle daytime look or a more intense evening glam.  The palette includes a carefully curated selection of shades that can be used alone or together to create endless possibilities. The warmer tones are perfect for adding a sun-kissed glow, while the cooler shades offer a pop of freshness to the complexion. Blending the shades together effortlessly creates a customized and seamless look that suits any skin tone.  The silky texture of the GXVE BEAUTY blush is a dream to work with. The formula glides smoothly onto the skin, without any patchiness or chalkiness. It blends like a dream, seamlessly melding with the skin for a natural finish. Even for those new to makeup, achieving a flawless application is a breeze with this palette.  What makes the GXVE BEAUTY blush even more irresistible is its incredible price point. Offering two high-quality blushes for just $28 is an absolute steal. The brand's commitment to quality without compromising on affordability is truly commendable. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast or a budget-conscious shopper, this palette is a must-have addition to your beauty collection. With its impressive pigmentation, versatility, smooth texture, and fantastic value, GXVE BEAUTY has crafted a blush palette that will undoubtedly become a staple in makeup routines everywhere.
